turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, could you put in an order for pickup at Humdinger's Pizza for me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes of course, from which store?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one in Palmer.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, how many pizzas are you going to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to get two.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, what's the first pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Lets make it a Pepperoni Pile.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let's do a large.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, would you like to customize it at all?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to add salami to the pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sorry, but they don't have salami. What do you want for the second pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's a bummer, could I get the Surfin' Rancher?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes you can! What size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll do a medium for this one.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, and anything special about this one?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Could I get a gluten free crust please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes you can! Do you need any sides?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll get a side of breadsticks as well.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, and what about drinks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thank you, I don't need any drinks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, so I've got a large pepperoni pile, and a medium gluten free surfin' rancher, with a side of breadsticks. Will that complete your order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes it will, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your order will be ready to pick up in about 25 minutes, and I sent the receipt to your mobile device via text!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you so much! I don't know what I'd do without you!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Anytime, you know i'll always be here!
